name: Suspicious Mini Asha Pockets
desc: An adorable pastry shaped like an Asha. A stronger fire was used for fear of undercooking the meat, but the result seems to be closer to a "Mini Ashy Pocket" rather than an Asha. It seems like eating it might just ruin your vacation, so maybe it's best to forget you ever made it...

customize.name: Recipe: Mini Asha Pockets
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Mini Asha Pockets.

customize.name: Mini Asha Pockets
customize.desc: An adorable pastry shaped like an Asha. Wrap the meat filling in dough, shape the pastry, then deep-fry until golden. Don't forget to paint on tiny sunglasses with sauce for a playful touch. It's not hard to guess why this snack is so popular — Asha are super, super cute, after all.

customize.name: Delicious Mini Asha Pockets
customize.desc: An adorable pastry shaped like an Asha. The fluffy, crispy outer layer glimmers gold like Mora. The sweet scent of onions blankets every slice of tender meat like the prelude to a holiday — like the cheerful spring in your step when you walk into your resort.

customize.name: Suspicious Mini Asha Pockets
customize.desc: An adorable pastry shaped like an Asha. A stronger fire was used for fear of undercooking the meat, but the result seems to be closer to a "Mini Ashy Pocket" rather than an Asha. It seems like eating it might just ruin your vacation, so maybe it's best to forget you ever made it...

customize.name: Fowl
customize.desc: A fresh chunk of fowl. Handled properly, it can make a hearty meal.

customize.name: Onion
customize.desc: A spherical vegetable. As vengeance for cutting it, it will make you cry, no matter how brave you are.

customize.name: Flour
customize.desc: A powder ground from wheat. No matter what it goes into, it brings a sense of satisfaction to the diner.

customize.name: Cheese
customize.desc: Made from fermented milk. High in energy, it's used in a wide range of dishes.

value.text:
A little surprise from the Easybreeze Holiday Resort.
Regenerates 1 HP to the selected character every 8s for 32s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
